introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This Privacy Policy describes how ICO Platform collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website and services. By using our platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.description: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our service to you:
informationCollection.personalInfo: Personal Information: Email address, name, phone number, address, and other information you provide when creating an account or using our services.
informationCollection.usageData: Usage Data: Information on how you access and use our website, including your IP address, browser type, pages visited, time spent on pages, and other diagnostic data.
informationCollection.cookies: Cookies and Tracking Data: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information to improve your experience.

useOfInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
useOfInformation.description: We use the collected information for various purposes, including:
useOfInformation.provideService: To provide and maintain our service, including monitoring the usage of our service.
useOfInformation.improveService: To improve our website and services by analyzing how users interact with our platform.
useOfInformation.communications: To communicate with you, including sending you updates, security alerts, and support messages.
useOfInformation.compliance: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms and policies.

dataSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
dataSharing.description: We may share your personal information in the following situations:
dataSharing.serviceProviders: With service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as hosting, data analysis, and customer service.
dataSharing.businessTransfers: In connection with a business transaction such as a merger, acquisition, or asset sale.
dataSharing.legalRequirements: When required by law, such as in response to a subpoena or similar legal process.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
userRights.access: The right to access the personal information we have about you.
userRights.rectification: The right to request correction of inaccurate information.
userRights.deletion: The right to request deletion of your personal information.
userRights.restriction: The right to request restriction of processing of your personal information.
userRights.dataPortability: The right to receive a copy of your personal information in a structured, machine-readable format.
userRights.objection: The right to object to our processing of your personal information.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Links to Other Websites
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our service does not address anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to ICO Platform. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.serviceDefinition: The ICO Platform website and all related services provided by us.
definitions.userDefinition: Any individual or entity that accesses or uses our Service.
definitions.companyDefinition: ICO Platform, Inc., the provider of the Service.
definitions.websiteDefinition: The ICO Platform website located at www.icoplatform.com.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using our Service, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you are using the Service on behalf of an organization, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.description: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account.
userAccounts.accuracy: You are responsible for maintaining the accuracy of your account information.
userAccounts.security: You are responsible for safeguarding the password used to access the Service and for any activities or actions under your password.
userAccounts.termination: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of ICO Platform and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of ICO Platform.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.description: Our Service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material. You are responsible for the content you post on or through the Service.
userContent.ownership: You retain any and all of your rights to any content you submit, post, or display on or through the Service.
userContent.license: By posting content on or through the Service, you grant us the right to use, modify, publicly perform, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such content on and through the Service.
userContent.restrictions: You agree not to post content that is illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortious, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy, or otherwise objectionable.

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.description: You may not access or use the Service for any purpose other than that for which we make the Service available. The following activities are prohibited:
prohibitedActivities.illegal: Engaging in any activity that violates any applicable law or regulation.
prohibitedActivities.infringement: Infringing upon or violating our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others.
prohibitedActivities.harmful: Attempting to interfere with, compromise the system integrity or security, or decipher any transmissions to or from the servers running the Service.
prohibitedActivities.impersonation: Impersonating or attempting to impersonate the Company, a Company employee, another user, or any other person or entity.
prohibitedActivities.automation: Using any robot, spider, or other automatic device, process, or means to access the Service for any purpose.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Your use of the Service is at your sole risk. The Service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. The Service is provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, or course of performance.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: In no event shall ICO Platform, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.description: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless ICO Platform and its licensee and licensors, and their employees, contractors, agents, officers, and directors, from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses, resulting from or arising out of your use and access of the Service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At ICO Platform, our mission is to provide transparent, comprehensive, and reliable information about cryptocurrency Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs) and token sales to help investors make informed decisions.
mission.description2: We strive to be the most trusted source of ICO data by maintaining the highest standards of accuracy, integrity, and impartiality in our listings and analyses.

research.title: In-depth Research
research.description: We conduct thorough research on each ICO project, analyzing team backgrounds, technology, tokenomics, and market potential.

listing.title: Comprehensive Listings
listing.description: We maintain an up-to-date database of active, upcoming, and past ICOs with detailed information on each project.

analytics.title: Market Analytics
analytics.description: We provide data-driven insights and analytics to help you understand market trends and performance metrics.

community.title: Community Building
community.description: We foster a community of informed investors and blockchain enthusiasts through educational content and forums.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to our team for assistance with any inquiries.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or need assistance? Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!
form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

questions.q1: How do I list my ICO project on your platform?
questions.q2: How do you verify the information about ICO projects?
questions.q3: Do you offer advertising or promotional services?
questions.q4: How can I report inaccurate information about a project?

answers.a1: To list your ICO project, please use the 'Submit Project' form in our Studio section. Our team will review your submission and may request additional information before publishing.
answers.a2: We have a dedicated research team that verifies project information through multiple sources, including official documentation, team interviews, and third-party audits. We strive for accuracy but always encourage users to conduct their own research.
answers.a3: Yes, we offer various promotional packages for ICO projects. Please contact our marketing team at marketing@icoplatform.com for more information about our advertising options.
answers.a4: If you notice any inaccurate information about a project, please use our 'Report Issue' feature on the project page or contact us directly. We appreciate community feedback to maintain data accuracy.

forgotPassword.sendFailed: Failed to send code. Check your email.
forgotPassword.resetSuccess: Password reset successful! You are now logged in.
forgotPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
forgotPassword.hintEnterCode: Enter the security code to unlock password fields.
forgotPassword.codeVerified: Security code verified! You can now set your new password.
